name: iso
description: iso is a small self hosted bookmark and link management service. It allows saving URLs with tags and notes, searching through them and organizing reading material via a clean, keyboard friendly interface.

features.title: Bookmark Storage
features.description: Save URLs with titles, descriptions, and custom notes

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging system

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search through bookmark titles, URLs, and notes instantly

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Minimal, distraction-free design focused on functionality

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your reading list and bookmarks on your own server
